name: statping-ng
description: Statping-ng is a self-hosted status page and monitoring platform. It pings services, records uptime, and presents results with historical graphs and alerts.
features: Service monitoring: Checks HTTP, TCP, ICMP, and other service types for availability.
Status page: Displays public-facing status page for service uptime.
Uptime tracking: Records historical uptime percentages and downtime incidents.
Response time graphs: Visualizes service response times over various periods.
Alert notifications: Sends alerts via email, Slack, Discord, or webhooks on failures.
Incident management: Logs and displays service incidents with timestamps.
Custom checks: Creates custom monitoring checks with flexible intervals.
API monitoring: Tests API endpoints and validates response codes and content.
SSL certificate monitoring: Alerts on expiring SSL certificates.
Mobile responsive: Manages monitoring and views status from mobile devices.
Multi-user support: Allows team members to manage services with different permissions.
Export metrics: Provides Prometheus metrics endpoint for external monitoring.
